org.netbeans.modules.refactoring.spi.ui

Class ScopeProvider.CustomScopeProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.refactoring.spi.ui.ScopeProvider
      • org.netbeans.modules.refactoring.spi.ui.ScopeProvider.CustomScopeProvider
  • Enclosing class:
    ScopeProvider

    public abstract static class ScopeProvider.CustomScopeProvider
extends ScopeProvider
    The CustomScopeProvider extends the normal scope provider to support scopes which can be customized by the user.
    Since:
    1.30
    See Also:
    ScopePanel, ScopeDescription, ScopeReference

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomScopeProvider

        public CustomScopeProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • setScope

        public abstract void setScope(@NullAllowed
                              Scope currentScope)
        Set the scope to be customized. This method will be called right before the provider is asked to show the customizer, with the currently selected scope.
        Parameters:
        currentScope - the Scope currently selected

      • showCustomizer

        public abstract boolean showCustomizer()
        Show a Dialog to customize the scope.
        Returns:
        true if the user succesfully specified a scope, false otherwise (ie. clicked cancel)
